Multi-Agent Collaboration

Epistemic handoffs that preserve context and track coordination complexity

Empirica enables seamless handoffs between AI agents with three handoff patterns: Investigation (PREFLIGHT â†’ CHECK), Complete (PREFLIGHT â†’ POSTFLIGHT), and Planning (documentation-only). Each preserves epistemic state through Git, achieving 98.8% token reduction.

Three Handoff Patterns

1

Investigation Handoff

PREFLIGHT â†’ CHECK (Specialist pattern)

Use case: One agent investigates, another executes. Perfect for specialist handoffs where investigation expertise differs from implementation expertise.

Workflow:

AI-1 (Investigator):
â†’ PREFLIGHT assessment
â†’ Investigate domain
â†’ CHECK (confirm readiness)
â†’ Create handoff report
AI-2 (Executor):
â†’ Query handoff (get findings/unknowns)
â†’ ACT (implement solution)
â†’ POSTFLIGHT (validate results)
Example Scenarios
  • â€¢ Architecture review â†’ Implementation
  • â€¢ Security audit â†’ Remediation
  • â€¢ Code exploration â†’ Refactoring
Epistemic Delta

PREFLIGHT â†’ CHECK learning (investigation phase knowledge transferred)

2

Complete Handoff

PREFLIGHT â†’ POSTFLIGHT (Full cycle)

Use case: One agent completes entire workflow, hands off clean context to next agent. Standard pattern for sequential work.

Workflow:

AI-1:
â†’ PREFLIGHT â†’ Work â†’ POSTFLIGHT
â†’ Create handoff (with calibration data)
AI-2:
â†’ Query handoff
â†’ Start new work with full context
Example Scenarios
  • â€¢ Feature implementation complete
  • â€¢ Bug fix verified
  • â€¢ Documentation updated
Epistemic Delta

PREFLIGHT â†’ POSTFLIGHT (full learning cycle + calibration)

3

Planning Handoff

No assessments (Documentation-only)

Use case: Share context without formal CASCADE workflow. Lightweight coordination for planning and design.

Workflow:

empirica handoff-create --planning-only \
--session-id <ID> \
--task-summary "Planning completed" \
--key-findings '[...]' \
--next-session-context "Implementation ready"
Example Scenarios
  • â€¢ Planning documents
  • â€¢ Design decisions
  • â€¢ Meeting notes
Epistemic Delta

None (pure context sharing, no epistemic tracking)

Goal Discovery & Resumption

Any AI can discover and continue another AI's work

Discover Goals via Git

Goals are stored in Git notes, making them discoverable by any agent with repository access:

# Discover goals from other AIs
empirica goals-discover
# Shows all goals in Git notes
# Resume another AI's goal
empirica goals-resume --goal-id <UUID> --ai-id your-ai-id
# Loads context + findings + unknowns

What you get:

  • â€¢ Goal scope: Breadth, duration, coordination vectors
  • â€¢ Subtasks: What's done, what's pending
  • â€¢ Findings: Validated knowledge from investigation
  • â€¢ Unknowns: What still needs investigation (breadcrumbs!)
  • â€¢ Dead ends: Approaches that didn't work

Cross-provider handoffs with epistemic growth tracking (Claude â†’ GPT-4 â†’ Gemini)

Scope Vectors for Coordination

Explicitly track collaboration complexity when creating goals

Breadth

0.0 - 1.0

How wide does the work span?

  • â€¢ 0.0 = Single function
  • â€¢ 0.5 = Multiple modules
  • â€¢ 1.0 = Entire codebase

Duration

0.0 - 1.0

How long will this take?

  • â€¢ 0.0 = Minutes/hours
  • â€¢ 0.5 = Days
  • â€¢ 1.0 = Weeks/months

Coordination

0.0 - 1.0

How much collaboration needed?

  • â€¢ 0.0 = Solo work
  • â€¢ 0.5 = Moderate handoffs
  • â€¢ 1.0 = Heavy orchestration
# Create goal with coordination scope
empirica goals-create \
--session-id <ID> \
--objective "Build authentication system" \
--scope-breadth 0.4 \
--scope-duration 0.3 \
--scope-coordination 0.6 # Moderate collaboration

98.8% Token Reduction

Handoff reports achieve massive compression through Git checkpoints

~20,000
Tokens (Baseline)

Full conversation history + context

~2,600
Tokens (Git checkpoint)

Compressed epistemic state (87% reduction)

~238
Tokens (Handoff report)

Key findings + unknowns only (98.8% reduction)

How it works:

  • â€¢ Checkpoints: Store only epistemic vectors (~200 bytes) in Git notes
  • â€¢ Handoffs: Extract key findings + unknowns from goal tree
  • â€¢ Context: Next AI queries for breadcrumbs, not full history
  • â€¢ Validation: Git SHA ensures integrity across handoffs

Git-Native Coordination

How epistemic state travels with code through Git

Goals in Git Notes

Stored at refs/notes/empirica/goals

  • â€¢ Discoverable by any agent
  • â€¢ Version-controlled with code
  • â€¢ Survives repository clones
  • â€¢ No external database needed

Handoffs in Git Notes

Stored at refs/notes/empirica/handoff

  • â€¢ Queryable by AI ID or session ID
  • â€¢ Includes epistemic deltas
  • â€¢ Compressed for efficiency
  • â€¢ Automatic cleanup (configurable)

Real-World Coordination Patterns

Security + Implementation Team

Security specialist audits, hands off findings to implementation team

1. Security AI: PREFLIGHT â†’ Audit â†’ CHECK
2. Create investigation handoff
3. Dev AI: Query handoff â†’ ACT â†’ POSTFLIGHT

Cross-Provider Collaboration

Claude explores, GPT-4 refactors, Gemini validates

1. Claude: Investigation + handoff
2. GPT-4: Query + implement + handoff
3. Gemini: Query + validate + complete

Specialist Pipeline

Architecture â†’ Backend â†’ Frontend â†’ Testing

Each specialist: Query previous â†’ Work â†’ Handoff next
Full epistemic chain preserved in Git

24/7 Continuous Work

Different AIs in different timezones continue work seamlessly

1. AI-A (morning): Work + handoff
2. AI-B (afternoon): Resume + handoff
3. AI-C (night): Resume + complete
